<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/microsoft-and-turbonomic/7-days-to-azure?utm_campaign=70157000001j56HAAQ]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I've been speaking with IT thought-leaders like you about the ways they are migrating their on-premises to AWS & Azure while consolidating their on-premises footprint. What has become clear is this problem is beyond human scale.
Turbonomic's Workload Automation solution for Hybrid Cloud enables out 2000+ customers to reduce the cost, risk, and complexity associated with migration and consolidation.
Our agnostic platform (supports VMware, AWS, Azure, etc.) provides ongoing optimization both on-premise and once workloads are in the cloud to ensure you're only paying for what you consume.
For a bit more context, please see the resources below:
- Migrate to Microsoft Azure in 7 Days with Turbonomic <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/microsoft-and-turbonomic/7-days-to-azure?utm_campaign=70157000001j56HAAQ]]> - AWS or Azure? How Turbonomic Enables Data-Driven Decisions <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects/which-cloud-webinar-v-1?utm_campaign=70157000001j56HAAQ]]> - How Freshfields plans AWS and Azure Migrations and Saves 20% on Azure Bill <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies/freshfields-success-story?utm_campaign=70157000001j56HAAQ]]>
I hope you find this information helpful and that you enjoy some treats that are on their way to your office and will be delivered next week.
Regards, Andrew
